jmortgage.payment.extra
Class DefaultExtraPmtMapBuilder

java.lang.Object
  jmortgage.payment.extra.DefaultExtraPmtMapBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExtraPmtMapBuilder
public final class DefaultExtraPmtMapBuilder
extends Object
implements ExtraPmtMapBuilder

The default implementation of ExtraPmtMapBuilder. This object builds an extra payment map based on the PmtKey and the number of years for a mortgage term. This object is immutable as long as the implementation of PmtKey it uses is immutable. DefaultPmtKey is immutable, so if this object uses DefaultPmtKey, it is immutable and its thread safety is guaranteed.

Since:
1.0
Author:
David Armstrong

Creates an object with the specified PmtKey implementation and number of years in the mortgage term.

Parameters:
pmtKey - the PmtKey implementation
years - the number of years in the mortgage term.

DefaultExtraPmtMapBuilder

public DefaultExtraPmtMapBuilder(PmtKey pmtKey,
                                 Integer years)
Creates an object with the specified PmtKey instance and number of years in the mortgage term. The years value is passed in as an Integer object. This constructor exists so clients can instantiate this object by using JMortgageFactory.getExtraPmtMapBuilder(java.lang.Class, java.lang.Class[], java.lang.Object[]), which uses reflection to build objects.

Parameters:
pmtKey - The PmtKey instance
years - The years in the mortgage
Method Detail

buildExtraPmtsMap

public Map<Long,Double> buildExtraPmtsMap(List<ExtraPmt> extraPmts)
Builds an extra payment Map object. The map uses a Long for the key that must match exactly the date of one of the regular mortgage payments. The value of the map is an implementation of FixedAmortizationBuilder.Payment. This map is used by an implemenation of FixedAmortizationBuilder to calculate the effect of the extra payments on an amortization schedule.

Specified by:
buildExtraPmtsMap in interface ExtraPmtMapBuilder
Parameters:
extraPmts - A List of objects that implement the ExtraPmt interface. A defensive copy of this List is made. Clients that need this List to be thread safe should either synchronize its modification or use a thread safe implementation of List like CopyOnWriteArrayList or ImmutableList.
Returns:
ImmutableMap of extra payments. The map is immutable, so its thread safety is guaranteed.

getPmtKey

public PmtKey getPmtKey()
Gets the PmtKey instantiation used to build the map of extra payments. The PmtKey instantiation must be the same as the one used to build the amortization table with an instantiation of FixedAmortizationBuilder to which the extra payments will apply.

Specified by:
getPmtKey in interface ExtraPmtMapBuilder
Returns:
PmtKey instantiation

getYears

public int getYears()
Gets the years in the mortgage term used to build the map of extra payments. The year value must be the same as the one used to build an amortization table with an instantiation of FixedAmortizationBuilder to which the extra payments will apply.

Specified by:
getYears in interface ExtraPmtMapBuilder
Returns:
int years value
